body: I think having it as an argument to `init_process_group` would be nice. To implement this, you'd need to change the [Python bindings](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/distributed/Module.cpp#L89-L117) and [this part](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THD/base/DataChannel.cpp#L19-L58) to pass the argument to the `DataChannel` (think of it as a wrapper for the backend). Thanks!
